## Checklist

If you want to suggest a new resource, please first acknowledge that you:

- [ ] have reviewed [contribution guidelines](https://github.com/hunicus/awesome-citadel/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] have made sure the resource hasn't already been included (search [README](https://github.com/hunicus/awesome-citadel/blob/master/README.md)) 
- [ ] have made sure the resource hasn't already been suggested, and if it has, that there is a strong reason to reconsider it (search [issues and pull requests](https://github.com/hunicus/awesome-citadel/issues))
- [ ] are only suggesting 1 resource in this issue

## Suggestion

**Name of resource:**

**Link:**

**Short description:** _please keep this under 100 characters_

**Category:**
